description: This is a Flutter widget implementing the Favorites screen for a recipe app. It displays a list of favorite recipes, handles loading state, updates when favorites change, and navigates to recipe details.

classes.name: FavoritesScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays user's favorite recipes.

classes.name: _FavoritesScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the FavoritesScreen, including loading favorite recipes, handling updates, and rendering UI.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches all recipes from the repository, filters by favorite IDs, and updates the state.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and triggers initial load of favorite recipes.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Adds a listener to the favorites provider to update the list when favorites change.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Removes the listener from the favorites provider.

methods.name: _onFavChanged
methods.description: Callback to reload favorite recipes when favorites are modified.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI based on loading state and whether there are favorite recipes.
